statements: UPSERT INTO fintech_solutions (id, account_number, balance, user_id, created_at) VALUES (1, 123456789, 1000.00, 1, '2022-01-01 08:00:00')
UPSERT INTO fintech_solutions (id, account_number, balance, user_id, created_at) VALUES (2, 987654321, 500.50, 2, '2022-01-02 10:30:00')
UPSERT INTO fintech_solutions (id, account_number, balance, user_id, created_at) VALUES (3, 555555555, 2000.75, 3, '2022-01-03 15:45:00')
UPSERT INTO users (username, email, password) VALUES ('john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'password123') ON CONFLICT (email) DO UPDATE SET username = 'johndoe_updated'
UPSERT INTO users (username, email, password) VALUES ('emma_smith', 'emma.smith@example.com', 'password456') ON CONFLICT (email) DO NOTHING
UPSERT INTO users (username, email, password) VALUES ('mike_jones', 'mike.jones@example.com', 'password789') ON CONFLICT (email) DO UPDATE SET password = 'updated_password789'
UPSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email, password) VALUES (1, 'JohnDoe', 'johndoe@example.com', 'pass123')
UPSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email, password) VALUES (2, 'JaneSmith', 'janesmith@example.com', 'pass456')
UPSERT INTO transactions (transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date) VALUES (1, 1, 100.50, '2022-05-15 10:30:00')

UPSERT INTO Customers (customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'John', 'Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890';

UPSERT INTO Accounts (account_id, customer_id, account_type, balance, date_opened) VALUES (1, 1, 'Savings', 1000.50, '2023-01-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE customer_id = 1, account_type = 'Savings', balance = 1000.50, date_opened = '2023-01-01';

UPSERT INTO Transactions (transaction_id, account_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date) VALUES (1, 1, 'Deposit', 500.25, '2023-01-15 12:00:00') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE account_id = 1, transaction_type = 'Deposit', amount = 500.25, transaction_date = '2023-01-15 12:00:00';

INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, username, email, registration_date) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = EXCLUDED.username, email = EXCLUDED.email, registration_date = EXCLUDED.registration_date;

INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, username, email, registration_date) VALUES (2, 'jane_smith', 'jane.smith@example.com', '2022-01-02') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = EXCLUDED.username, email = EXCLUDED.email, registration_date = EXCLUDED.registration_date;

INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, username, email, registration_date) VALUES (3, 'alice_wonderland', 'alice.wonderland@example.com', '2022-01-03') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = EXCLUDED.username, email = EXCLUDED.email, registration_date = EXCLUDED.registration_date;
